verbs.description: [ARG0: surgeon general] [V: says] [ARG1: everyone should carry opioid antidote the surgeon general says everyone should carry the antidote naloxone to fight opioid overdoses but experts say words are not enough in this deadly epidemic opioid dr leana wen naloxone lindsey vuolo national institutes of health dr jerome adams food and drug administration opioid abuse scott gottlieb federal government of the united states]

surgeon general says everyone [V: should] carry opioid antidote the surgeon general says everyone should carry the antidote naloxone to fight opioid overdoses but experts say words are not enough in this deadly epidemic opioid dr leana wen naloxone lindsey vuolo national institutes of health dr jerome adams food and drug administration opioid abuse scott gottlieb federal government of the united states
